title: Feature issue: Notifications to TAB
author: Apollon-Theos
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

Notifications to TAB, like "Screenshots". ListView with one row for one notification, "new" and "readed" can have bold and normal font. Maybe exist button for "Delete", "Again unread" and etc.

## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->

No pop-up windows for every notification, instead increase num...
